FieldDefinition.description: Direct test suite name, i.e. thing name. If empty, the testCase service is assumed to be on the current thing.
FieldDefinition.name: testSuite

FieldDefinition.description: Test case name, i.e. service name. If empty, the testSuite is considered a pointer to another test suite.
FieldDefinition.name: testCase

FieldDefinition.description: Specifies a default user, under which this test case is executed. Can be overridden by the Run() service parameter.
FieldDefinition.name: runAs
